cat: A small furry animal often kept as a pet.
dog: A common pet that is loyal and friendly.
apple: A round fruit that is usually red, green, or yellow.
book: A set of pages with words and pictures, used for reading.
car: A vehicle used for travel on roads.
tree: A tall plant with a trunk and branches.
run: To move quickly on your feet.
jump: To push yourself off the ground and into the air.
water: A clear liquid people and animals drink.
sun: The bright star that gives us light and heat.
moon: The round object that moves around the Earth at night.
red: A color like the color of an apple or a rose.
ball: A round object used for playing games.
bird: A winged animal that can often fly.
fish: An animal that lives in water and has gills.
door: A movable barrier used to open and close an entrance.
chair: A piece of furniture for sitting.
table: A flat surface with legs used to put things on.
light: Something that makes things visible or bright.
night: The time when it is dark outside.
friend: A person you like and trust.
home: The place where a person lives.
phone: A device used to call or message people.
mouse: A small rodent that likes cheese.
bread: A common food made from flour and water.
grass: The green plants that cover the ground.
flower: The colorful part of a plant that often smells nice.
cloud: A group of tiny water drops in the sky.
river: A large, flowing body of water.
shirt: A piece of clothing worn on the upper body.
pants: Clothing worn on the lower body to cover the legs.
shoes: Footwear worn to protect the feet.
smile: To make a happy expression with your mouth.
laugh: To show happiness by making a sound.
drink: To take liquid into your mouth and swallow.
eat: To put food into your mouth and chew it.
think: To use your mind to form ideas or plans.
learn: To gain knowledge or skill by studying.
write: To make letters or words on a surface.
sing: To make musical sounds with the voice.
dance: To move your body to music.
